cause.description:
It was reporteed that the stupid Indians found OM KALSOUM in a little village, on the outskirts of Delhi, they are enslaving her in one of their secret labs guarded by AMTAB TSHAN, not the one who make stupid Indian movies AMTAB TSHAN is the guy who makes stupid Indian movies, and one of their indianist doctor will perform a risky operation to remove OMKALSOUM vocal cords so they can put it in their evil President GHANDY cuz he wants to win star academy this year The Egyptian government won't do anything to save OM KALSOUM because of the obscene incident when OM KALSOUM took her clothes off on stage and ran after our ever democratic president and tried to give him a hug. Plz no money just give us kit kat chunky cuz OM KALSOUM loves kit kat chunky
1. OM KALSOUM IS ALIVE
cause.mission: bring OM KALSOUM back from india
cause.name: bring OM KALSOUM back from india
